sqlMap.insert: insert into T_CLIENT_TZCL(ID, TITLE, DIGEST, RECUSER_ID, RECUSER_NAME, REC_DATE, FJ_ID, CONNECT_ID, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_CODE) values(#id#, #title#, #digest#, #recuserId#, #recuserName#, #recDate#, #fjId#, #connectId#, #productName#, #productCode#)
sqlMap.update: update T_CLIENT_TZCL set title=#title#, digest=#digest#, recuser_id=#recuserId#, recuser_name=#recuserName#, rec_date=#recDate#, FJ_ID=#fjId#, connect_id=#connectId#, product_name=#productName#, product_code=#productCode# where ID=#id#
update T_CLIENT_TZCL set FJ_ID=#fjId# where ID=#id#
sqlMap.select: SELECT ID, TITLE, DIGEST, RECUSER_ID, RECUSER_NAME, REC_DATE, FJ_ID, CONNECT_ID, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_CODE FROM ( SELECT row_.*, ROWNUM rownum_ FROM ( $sql$ ) row_ WHERE ROWNUM <= #end# ) WHERE rownum_ >#begin#
SELECT ID, TITLE, DIGEST, RECUSER_ID, RECUSER_NAME, REC_DATE, FJ_ID, CONNECT_ID, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_CODE FROM T_CLIENT_TZCL where ID=#tzclId#
